msbt.message: It's MONDAY! What do you think I should do this week?
Ooh! I could think about dance practice! I haven't thought about doing that in a while.
Oh! Maybe I'll finally try to beat Super Pro?! This could be the week!
I know! I'm going to go on long walks and look fab doing it!
Do you have, you know, a set day for cleaning your house?I usually only do it when I feel like it.<10_4 /> And I NEED to start feeling like it.
I started cleaning my place yesterday, but I'm nowhere close to done.But I did read a bunch of comics, and that was way WAY fun!
I was cleaning my place when I found one of my practice autographs from forever ago. And it's sooo bad! For one thing? It was legible!
You know what day it is, ?Me neither! I drank WAY too much coffee, like, three days ago? Yeah. Three. And haven't slept since!WHEEEEEEEE!

Do aliens think we're gross? They might be all, "Earthlings don't have zqurpgees? Ew!"If I met an alien, I'd say, "What's up, aliens? Hey, did you know everyone is different and that's tr√®s great?"Then I'd teach them how to dance, because everybody loves dancing.
Stretching after dance practice is mondo important!You also have to clean up the stuff you knocked over while dancing so you don't trip over it later!
OH YEAH! I totes forgot Black Hole Skullbeasts VII is on TV tonight! Full-on horror!
I need to make sure I don't miss a minute of itBHSB movies are suuuuuper plot heavy!
Horror movies are totes my jam! Skullbeasts III kept me awake for a week! VII is going to be crazy!
I wonder if I could survive the Skullbeasts if I met them face-to- face? I'm a dancer, not a fighter.
Don't Friday nights make you want to hang out and PARTY with everyone?! I just have to decide on a theme
Oh! A costume party! Everybody in their costumes, with no idea who they're talking to
The only answer is THE best answer, and that answer's DANCE PARTY! Le duh!
It'd be kind of lame, but maybe a boring party where we all just eat dinner and talk quietly? <10_4 />WEIRD!
I did everything I planned to today, so I want to take it easy tomorrow
HA! All I planned to do today was to take it easy. It's all I ever do, so I'm totally great at it!
I could watch TV for 24 hours. I'm talking non-stop. It'd be a SUPER serious challenge, but I'm up for it!
You don't get to be as famous as I am by lounging around! I have stuff to do!
Sunday's a great day for DIY projects!
DIY Do It, Yes! Trying a new song style? Dang, I'm Yodeling! Or maybe, Dance In Yajammies! It's all DIY!
I've invented a cool new kind of DIY called ASTDIFM. It means, "Ask Someone To Do It For Me."

Why IS Sunday a great DIY day? Has non-stop Sunday DIY marketing just made me THINK it's a great DIY day?Who am I, ? I mean, am I really a DIY fan? Or just someone who fell for a DIY ad?I have a lot of soul-searching to do I have to DIYMY OWN HEART AND SOUL! I'm a DIY fan, after all!
